name: Galarian Articuno
author: Shin Nagasawa
flavor_text: Known as Articuno, this Pokémon fires beams that can immobilize opponents as if they had been frozen solid.

abilities.name: Cruel Charge
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may attach up to 2 {P} Energy cards from your hand to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psylaser
attacks.effect: Discard all {P} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
